ygData.subject: Misc information that might be pole related...
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree.. .kick the troll from the board. In other news... I decided to go zoo hunting the other day... yes, you can kill all those animals in the zoo, the
ygData.messageBody:
I agree.. .kick the troll from the board.


In other news...

I decided to go zoo hunting the other day... yes, you can kill all those
animals in the zoo, the guards get real pissed but they can't get to you if
you hop over into the little stalls the animals sit in.

The tiger and bear I killed with no problem, and I got a tiger skin from
the tiger that I haven't sold yet because it looks so cool. Anyways, the
interesting part is that when I killed the minotaur I lost faction with the
king, gemchoppers, eldritch collective etc... The reason I think this is
interesting is because the book mentions campturing a minotaur for the zoo,
and its also interesting that whoever made the zoo went through the trouble
of giving this minotaur good faction with the gnomes. The tiger and bear
had no faction hit at all, but the minotaur does.

I tried talking to the minotaur and giving him various things but it didn't
help any, I also tried talking to the keeper underneath the minotaur and
didn't make any progress there either. But they are definately linked somehow.

Rotgut
